title: Helping Businesses in Communities of Color
itunes:title: Helping Businesses in Communities of Color
description:
Renée Johnson, Senior Advisor at Public Private Strategies, discusses the PPS campaign to help build up minority owned businesses.
Hosts: Tim Stenovec and Katie Greifeld. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
